verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Be my strength , my strength O God
Be my strength , my strength O God
Be my strength , my strength O God
Be my strength , my strength O God

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Father, light the way
Be my present help
You are my God
You are my God

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Be my peace, My peace O God
Be my peace, My peace O God

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Father light the way
Be my present help
You are my God
You are my God

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
When I'm overwhelmed
Lead me to the rock
You are my God
You are my God
You are my God
You are my God
You are my God
You are my God
You are my God
You are my God

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
And I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
You are my God

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
I will worship you always
I will worship you always
I will worship you always
You are my God

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
You are my God
And I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
And I will worship you always
You are my God

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines:
Be my peace, my peace, O God
Be my peace, my peace, O God
Be my strength, my strength, O God
Be my strength, my strength, O God
